long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your reading with Bombastic Reading, a browser extension that enhances content absorption. By identifying important body text from an article, it dynamically highlights them in bold, letting you concentrate on vital details. Easily scan and understand complex text. Empower your reading speed and comprehension with Bombastic Reading.

-Effortless Comprehension: Bombastic Reading makes reading effortless by selectively emphasizing critical content, boosting your comprehension.

-Faster Reading: Quickly scan through articles, reports, and documents, absorbing information faster than ever before.

-Focus on Essentials: Avoid information overload and focus on the core details that matter most.

More features coming soon!
